# TypeScript 'process' name not found error (2026-02-06 14:51Z)

_**User (2026-02-06 14:51Z)**_

/fix Cannot find name 'process'. Do you need to install type definitions for node? Try `npm i --save-dev @types/node`.

---

_**Agent (model copilot/auto)**_

The error occurs because TypeScript doesn't recognize the `process` global object. You need to install the Node.js type definitions.

To fix this issue, run the following command in your terminal:


```bash
npm i --save-dev @types/node
```


After installing the types, TypeScript will recognize Node.js globals like `process`, `__dirname`, and other Node.js APIs used in your Vite configuration file.

---
